basics.name: Colby Kagamida
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2023.

work.company: Electrical and Computer Engineering Department at UH Manoa
highlights: Grade programming projects for the class EE160: Programming for Engineers

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
